article_text:
Katie Taylor and Doug Hammond were married at the Wedgewood on Boulder Creek on Oct. 1, 2015.

Katie is the daughter of Bob and Brenda Taylor, of Boulder. Doug is the son of Mike and Ina Hammond, of Macomb, Ill.

Katie works for Boulder Community Health; Doug works for Green Mountain Cemetery in Boulder.

The couple honeymooned in Mexico and will reside in Boulder.
